A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I woke up today from watching this film and my first words to my fiance were\, \"I can't get out of bed. I am heartbroken\". What happened in that theater was a travesty and a slap in the face of everyone who loves Star Wars. An absolute disgrace of a film\, with sloppy story telling\, bad humor\, plot holes the size of the grand canyon\, and an ending that might as well have just faded to a picture of Mickey Mouse giving the audience a huge middle finger \"f*** you\". I have never came out of a film more disappointed than \"The Last Jedi\". I will never forgive Disney for that they did to Luke.
